titleStmt.title: Iohn Robinson's park, or A merry fit of wooing. Within a park a young man met a maid with courting and sporting the damsel with him staid in pastime and pleasure she uttered her mind saying pray thee sweet hony be loving and kind.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication taken from Wing (2nd ed.)
Right half sheet contains: The second part to the same tune.
Reproduction of original in: University of Glasgow. Library.
